title: Airfares Jumped Nearly 11% in March From Prior Month
sub_head: The consumer-price index and other data sources suggest booming interest in spring and summer travel
body:
Youâ€™re not imagining that climb in spring and summer airfares.
Airline fares jumped 10.7% in March from February according to the latest consumer-price index reading, which measures what consumers pay for goods and services. Prices, not seasonally adjusted, were 23.6% higher than a year ago.
